column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Best. BEST. Steakhouse I've been to in years. Honestly
column2: cannot recommend this place enough. So happy we made it here. For appetizer we had the garlic shrimp... To die for! and the freshest shrimp cocktail. Any shrimp is a must! For dinner I had the 6 ounce filet
column3: my husband had the bone in. The meat literally melts in your mouth. The bacon Mac and cheese is phenomenal!! Must try the carrot cake!!! If you can request a waiter
column4: Brandon is sooo nice and John is great. We will definitely be traveling back to Chicago to have Bavette's again!
